channel.title: Godsword Wielding
channel.description:
Hello, In my server my rune 2h looks just like it should (how you hold it) But my godswords do not.. Is there a way i can just copy the way the rune 2h looks when you wield it?
Q2 : How can i make it so a weapon hits higher or lower? like making ags special attack stronger?
Thanks for any help,
Viety

item.title: Godsword Wielding
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:4, topic:366646”][quote author=Viety link=topic=462848.msg3385810#msg3385810 date=1288452440]
Im on a old allstar scape v1. I want to learn to code something basic thought it would be good:)
[/quote]
Ah… AllstarScape.
In that case both questions are in Client.Java if I’m correct. Just search for the Rune 2h item id, and then search for the Armadyl Godsword Item Id and the special should be with it I do believe.[/quote]

I believe it looks like this,

 /* ADD MORE TWO HANDED ITEMS HERE */

    public static int more2handed[] = { 7158, 1319, 6528, 14915};

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword Wielding
item.dc:creator: @Viety Viety
item.description:
@Viety wrote:

Alright ill see what i can do thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword Wielding
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Viety:

Im on a old allstar scape v1. I want to learn to code something basic thought it would be good:)

Ah… AllstarScape.
In that case both questions are in Client.Java if I’m correct. Just search for the Rune 2h item id, and then search for the Armadyl Godsword Item Id and the special should be with it I do believe.

Read full topic
